attributes.action: dissolve parliment due to  the expenses row and let us vote for new MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to clean up westminster we need to restart the whole idea of politics and mp,s . the best way for this is to dissolve parliment,let the public vote on who's dodgey and who's not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
